name: Crab Ravage
description:
When the Konnietober2020 prompt is Monster, and you're currently listening to the Medieval cover of Crab Rave, there is only one possible outcome.

Another game based on a prompt by KonnieDraws

Credits:
Programming, Design, Lack of Art: Mana Kouwenberg

Music:
Surf Shimmy by Kevin MacLeod
Link| License

How to play:
W to jump
A and S to move
